website_summaries.verdict: One big step up from your grandma's Calamine lotion.
pros: Dries instantly and forms a protective barrier over rash
Reviewers say it works better than home remedies like baking soda and vinegar to relieve itch and dry out blisters
cons: When dry, the cream turns pink, so it's noticeable in public
Although the bottle says relief lasts for 8 hours, reviewers say it's more like 3

customer_reviews.title: No More Itchy Skin
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this product. I read a lot of the comments and decided to give it a try. The worse would be it didn't work and I wasted my money. WELL, so far so good. It REALLY does work, no more itchy skin for me. I WILL be buying it again & again & again.
customer_reviews.author: KAZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: After obtaining poison ivy on my arm for the 1st time in my life I spoke with a Pharmacist who recommended this brand. Of course Amazon was cheaper than the pharmacy so I went with the spray for convenience. My experience wasn’t good. Even with a small amount of spray it didn’t absorb quick enough on my arm thus the run down occurred. I gave this several attempts but had no success. It also left a residue on my bathroom counter. For me this product didn’t work for my poison ivy.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: GOOD POISON IVY CREAM
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND IS VERY ALLERGIC TO POISON IVY AND WE HAVE A LOT OF IT ON OUR PROPERTY. HE'S ALWAYS GETTING INTO IT. IT SAYS 2 OZ. BUT IT IS A BIG TUBE OF MEDICINE. IT'S LIKE CALAMINE LOTION ONLY THICKER. IT TAKES AWAY THE ITCH. NICE PRICE FOR THE CREAM. IT IS PINK BUT IT MATCHES THE SKIN. I REALLY RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: BEST for poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic and have tried it all, this is the BEST product I have found to stop the itch and prevent rash spread. keep in mind, this does NOT remove the oil from your skin which causes itch, you will still need to clean the area. but this is the best solution for after the oils are gone to deal with the remaining rash, and I have tried it all
customer_reviews.author: Meagan N Walters

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: if you get poison ivy, this stuff right here will make you feel much better. its the only brand i buy, all the other creams out there do not compare to Ivarest. it works great. i am highly allergic to PI and this takes away the discomfort immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Krp Diem

customer_reviews.title: Great anti itch cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my goto itch cream. Works immediately on bug bites and rashes from plants - hit a rash from pulling weeds in short sleeve so I immediately washed my arm and rubbed ivarest and worked great ! No rash, no itch! Does stain your clothes so need to dry it out or you'll have pink stains all over
customer_reviews.author: magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Worked best
customer_reviews.text: Worked best out of the many creams I bought but still didn’t relieve the itching from poison ivy too well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything else I've ever tried!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I always have the worst time getting rid of poison ivy! I usually have it for at least a month and it spreads everywhere! Ivarest not only stops the itching, it stops the spreading and dries up the rash in days!
customer_reviews.author: Darcel

customer_reviews.title: Worked Amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 1 year old and my 4 year old son. The live in the woods and he had it every where. Even his face! It helped him so much! We even tried something before we received this and it did nothing. Would 100% buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas & Miranda

customer_reviews.title: A great weapon to add to a poison ivy/oak/sumac arsenal
customer_reviews.text: This worked fairly well. Though it didn’t stop my arms from itching entirely, it greatly reduced my urge to scratch the affected areas. Smell was not too strong and consistency was tolerable
customer_reviews.author: H.Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Poison ivy sucks.  This helps
customer_reviews.text: Poison ivy sucks. This not only helps, it signifies to the rest of the world that you have some sort of skin condition, so people give you a wide berth when out in public.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Iacobelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product- small tube lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best anti itch cream I’ve found. I get really bad reactions to bug bites and this almost stops the itch immediately, however I don’t think it lasts 8hrs. The tube does last a long time, even though it’s small. It also helped my son who broke out in severe hives while on amoxicillin.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It work...
customer_reviews.text: If these products make for poison ivy is not good, if this make for stop itch i agreed.. Did not see any better then I stop used it..
customer_reviews.author: Irongohon

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time getting poison ivy. Got another one to save me further problems. Something better must be out. I just don’t think this is if.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: yet I do wish it was clear rather than colored like calamine lotion
customer_reviews.text: Ivarest really helps relieve my poison ivy rashes, yet I do wish it was clear rather than colored like calamine lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Young

customer_reviews.title: Tacky paste
customer_reviews.text: Good for itching but kinda makes a tacky paste on your skin so you can’t do much once you have it on or it will get all over everything. Cortisone with cooling gel worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I get bit by bugs a lot and tend to get poison something once or twice a year. Dries up fast and really does last about 8 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally - Something that works!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for shipping this to me so quickly. I was in agony from poison ivy! Didn't want to venture out to the store - because COVID -19. Tried every home remedy and nothing gave me lasting results, till this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Really does what it claims and stops the itching.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Bill

customer_reviews.title: That it does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff helped so much, not watery, so it stays on the area you put it. Dries it up and takes the itch and burn away fast.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Stops itching quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take much cream to relieve an itch from insect bites.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn day

customer_reviews.title: This is my GO TO when I run into the poison ivy/oak.
customer_reviews.text: Always works. Just apply it as soon as possible to maximize the benefits
customer_reviews.author: TMI

customer_reviews.title: Helps with itchiness
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great!! It helps with the itching so much
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rickrode

customer_reviews.title: I just have to look at poison ivy and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I just have to look at poison ivy and I seem to get it. Ivarest works very well for me in helping to control the itching.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic to poison sumac, and this cream works very well
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for all types of bites and rashes!
customer_reviews.author: Margie M.

customer_reviews.title: It is Wonderful, the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: It Really Works and exceeded my expectations. It looks like Calamine lotion and is even better than the Spray because it contains an Antihistamine which cuts down the itch and makes having poison a little more bearable. It lasts at least 8 hours so when I apply it at before bedtime I find that I don't wake up in the middle of the night itching and having to reapply any more until the morning when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Noles

customer_reviews.title: IT ACTUALLY WORKS!!️ TAKES AWAY ITCHING !!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: This cream is the best stuff I have ever used for poison ivy, poison sumac. It actually works and suppresses the terrible itching that can drive one crazy. I have tried some other lotions & creams, believe me, this is by far the best. It is ( white) skin colored so you can go out and your rash is pretty well camouflaged
customer_reviews.author: Ilsalund

customer_reviews.title: Best Itch Cream Yet!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about Ivarest and I'm so happy with it I bought two and a third in the spray bottle. Although this is sold for poison ivy, and I initially used it on that (calmed the heat and itch within minutes), I have since started to use it on all insect bites and it works better than anything else in my medicine cabinet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years for any rash or itching. It gives immediate long-lasting relief. It contains an antihistamine which helped contain an allergic reaction to bee stings when the pill form was not available.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for years and it's the best insect bite medicine I've found
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson was playing outside in the early evening and got covered in mosquito bites. He showered and then I put the Ivarest on him. Within seconds there was no more itching. By the morning you could not even find any evidence of bites. I've been using this product for years and it's the best insect bite medicine I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best treatment in town
customer_reviews.text: Stops the itching, spread, and discomfort of poison plant induced rashes. I would not hesitate to buy if you need it! (Also pleasant for bug bites).
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I thought it would and a little goes a long way. I’m very happy I found it and will always keep some around just in case. Buy it before you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bachor

customer_reviews.title: No returns or refunds on this product.
customer_reviews.text: This might be a good product for some irritations, but not for bug bites. I can't return it, and now I'm stuck with a used one and a brand new one that hasn't been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Rita V. Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Best relief from poison ivy itch!
customer_reviews.text: Ivarest is my go-to treatment for poison ivy. It’s been a few were years, but I somehow got into some poison ivy recently. Oh no! I am not disappointed—it’s still the best!
customer_reviews.author: m.Angel

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Soap for 20 seconds and wiping with a washcloth will assist in removing the invisible grease from poisoning plants, and when I need to get rest and could get the relief from washing this gives me that extra peace.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Itching
customer_reviews.text: This product is really great for itching. Works better than anything else tried.
customer_reviews.author: CEG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up my poison ivy in a few days. Stopped itching immediately.
customer_reviews.author: marcia a. kay

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: does not work well with poison ivy. my home made salve works better lol. DO not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more itches
customer_reviews.text: Works great on itches!! Need to have this in your medicine cabinet!!
customer_reviews.author: meaner

customer_reviews.title: He takes the Itch away and numbs all at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Soothing,Non-greasy and best thing I’ve ever used on poison ivy
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works great i
customer_reviews.text: Works great for insect bites. Use it on my grandkids...stops the itching well.
customer_reviews.author: D. McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have! Works fast and we'll!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Misiaszek

customer_reviews.title: Thick cream, stays in place and stops the itch.  What more could you want?
customer_reviews.text: Thick cream, stays in place and stops the itch. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: mrs_goatman

customer_reviews.title: Best ivy cream
customer_reviews.text: Works faster and longer that other off the counter creams
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Product that Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I garden in Florida nearly year round. I'm very allergic to poison ivy. Having a supply on-hand has enabled me to keep the severity down very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Farrell

product_meta.title: Ivarest 8 Hour Maximum Strength Anti - Itch Cream - 2 Oz
product_meta.description: Maximum strength antihistamine exerts an analgesic effect by temporarily stopping the reaction.
feature_bullets: Country of origin is United States

Directions: Do not use more often than directed. Apply Ivarest liberally to form a layer you can not see through.Adults and children 2 years and older: apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. Children under 2 years of age: consult a doctor.
